website_path = '/dataset/nyc-taxi-zones/resource/b8b92f4c-2d89-45b6-aeae-7467322e3e6d'
url = website_url + website_path

## Grab the anchor tags from the website

1. Open the URL and read the whole page
1. Parse the binary HTML string
1. Retrieve all of the anchor tags

anchors = soup.find_all('a', href=True)
